languages.text: "Одиночество... Оно не так дурно. Когда я поведал тебе о смерти Арнульфа и Скьядди, ты заметил{mf||а}, что зря они вернулись за мной. Горько признавать, но, не имей я товарищей, не обрекал бы их на жуткую погибель".

"Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."
languages.original_text: "Одиночество... Оно не так дурно. Когда я поведал тебе о смерти Арнульфа и Скьядди, ты заметил{mf||а}, что зря они вернулись за мной. Горько признавать, но, не имей я товарищей, не обрекал бы их на жуткую погибель".

traits.locale_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

"Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

"Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

"Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

languages.text: «Estar solo... no es tan espantoso. Cuando le conté cómo habían muerto Arnoolf y Skyaddi, dijo que no deberían haber vuelto a por mí. Aunque las palabras me resultan amargas, si no hubiera tenido hermanos en primer lugar no habría podido condenarlos a una muerte atroz».
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: «Estar solo... no es tan espantoso. Cuando le conté cómo habían muerto Arnoolf y Skyaddi, dijo que no deberían haber vuelto a por mí. Aunque las palabras me resultan amargas, si no hubiera tenido hermanos en primer lugar no habría podido condenarlos a una muerte atroz».

languages.text: “孤身一人……并不可怕。当我告诉你阿努尔夫和海加迪的死讯时，你说他们当初根本不应该回去救我。这些话听起来很苦涩，但如果我一开始就没带上这两位兄弟，他们就不会死得那么惨。”
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: “孤身一人……并不可怕。当我告诉你阿努尔夫和海加迪的死讯时，你说他们当初根本不应该回去救我。这些话听起来很苦涩，但如果我一开始就没带上这两位兄弟，他们就不会死得那么惨。”

languages.text: 「ひとりでいるのは…そう悪くはない。アーノルフとスキアディの死についてあんたに話した時、俺の元にはもうその死は現れないだろうとあんたは言った。その言葉は俺には心苦しく感じたが、もし俺に始めから兄弟なんていなければ、彼らを悲惨な死に導くこともなかっただろう」
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとりでいるのは…そう悪くはない。アーノルフとスキアディの死についてあんたに話した時、俺の元にはもうその死は現れないだろうとあんたは言った。その言葉は俺には心苦しく感じたが、もし俺に始めから兄弟なんていなければ、彼らを悲惨な死に導くこともなかっただろう」

languages.text: « Ma foi... la solitude n'est pas si terrible. Quand je vous ai annoncé la disparition d'Arnoolf et Skyaddi, vous m'avez répondu qu'ils n'auraient pas dû revenir me chercher. Vos mots m'ont laissé un goût amer dans la bouche, mais si je n'avais pas eu de frères, je n'aurais pas pu les condamner à un sort aussi funeste. »
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi... la solitude n'est pas si terrible. Quand je vous ai annoncé la disparition d'Arnoolf et Skyaddi, vous m'avez répondu qu'ils n'auraient pas dû revenir me chercher. Vos mots m'ont laissé un goût amer dans la bouche, mais si je n'avais pas eu de frères, je n'aurais pas pu les condamner à un sort aussi funeste. »

languages.text: "Allein zu sein ... ist gar nicht so grauenhaft. Als ich Euch vom Tod von Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr gesagt, sie hätten nicht zurückkommen sollen, um mich zu holen. Die Worte schmecken bitter in meinem Mund, doch hätte ich von vornherein keine Brüder gehabt, dann hätte ich sie nicht zu einem solch grausamen Tod verurteilen können."
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: "Allein zu sein ... ist gar nicht so grauenhaft. Als ich Euch vom Tod von Arnoolf und Skyaddi berichtet habe, habt Ihr gesagt, sie hätten nicht zurückkommen sollen, um mich zu holen. Die Worte schmecken bitter in meinem Mund, doch hätte ich von vornherein keine Brüder gehabt, dann hätte ich sie nicht zu einem solch grausamen Tod verurteilen können."

languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

languages.text: "Yalnızlık o kadar da kötü bir şey değil. Sana Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin ölümünden bahsettiğimde benim için dönmelerinin aptallık olduğunu söylemiştin. Bunu söylerken yüreğim yansa da en başından hiç kardeşim olmasalardı onları böyle kötü bir ölümle lanetlemiş olmazdım."
languages.original_text: "Being alone... is not so terrible. When I told you of the death of Arnoolf and Skyaddi, you said that they should not have come back for me. The words taste bitter in my mouth, but if I had had no brothers to begin with, then I could not have doomed them to a terrible death."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızlık o kadar da kötü bir şey değil. Sana Arnoolf ve Skyaddi'nin ölümünden bahsettiğimde benim için dönmelerinin aptallık olduğunu söylemiştin. Bunu söylerken yüreğim yansa da en başından hiç kardeşim olmasalardı onları böyle kötü bir ölümle lanetlemiş olmazdım."
